channel.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
channel.description:
once i had this guy, i ipbanned him, he came back online? =S
like wtf?!
then he let my server crash and shit like that!
how can he do this and how can i prevent 'people' doing this?!
=(
help plz!!
if you can help me, and it works, i could make you a MOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
grtzz

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @ddsowns ddsowns
item.description:
@ddsowns wrote:

[quote=“frugoo scape, post:22, topic:117749”][quote author=ddsowns link=topic=167033.msg1556777#msg1556777 date=1183165544]
no no no…his name is “admin” common hacker on every server deleting char file wont do anything and ip ban wont work he logs in about every hour and says random like “edjgjghefij” or w.e but when u delete his admin it always comes back and wen he logs in and u try ban u get kicked trust me its a glitch hack…had many times on my server…
[/quote]

Your stupid. Edit your source. If you had a brain, you would of known what was causing this 3 years ago.

For all the stupid people out there that want a hint search your client.java for “admin”.[/quote]fuck u im not a nerd havent been playing 3 years fag

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Throw in a wildcard*?
Ban using hostname instead :rolleyes:
Drop in a activation key in your source… Stop those evil server crashers

Stop making use of bloods. And remove all C-bows in your server temperarily ;D

Use Server patchs which read from system outprint and program to take action accordingly.

Beyond that theres not much you can do… Or file a law suit for attempting to rape you… Take down your server, Switch ip, Use hamachi…

Run around like a maniac screaming you’re hacked.
Go to your bank machine, withdraw some cash and scream “I WON! I WON! OMG! Third time this week!”.

P.S I take no responsibility for any results due to any of the suggested methods.
P.S.S (I know some of it was bs near the end but try the first few tricks ;))

Read full topic
item.source: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“getsome, post:28, topic:117749”][quote author=1337 king link=topic=167033.msg1557453#msg1557453 date=1183183214]
Hey, getsome.

What source do you reccommend me using? I’d like a better log in system, and stuff.
[/quote]hmm i always recomend p16 blitz great source its a bit mroe advanced tough but its a great base for any coder whit some imagination

if u do feel like doing less on the server but u still want a very good base i recomend cheezscape 80,it has the same structure as pimscape/testscape because test and pimp are based from a very old cheezscape nevertheless u can also make ure own source from scratch like i did but this takes time,experience and allot of patience.[/quote]Do you know of any good blank sources, that have some very basic things?

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

well let me share u a trick :

-If you use sources like pimpscape,testscape you can never proper ip ban anybody
because these old sources dont use proper log in systems

all it reque,ers a quik finger that can click 20 times on log-in and u are in the server even whit an IP-ban because the server lagging a litle it wil lskip the packets and cheat u.

-A player that has a internet provider that supports IP-refresh can never be Ip-Banned,and ye s then il go whit that other dude just keep ip-banning him until he gives up

-Like i stated above some internet providers support ip refresh altough if u can find the main dynamic-ip its just a matter of putting that ip in and it will block the connection of that player.

-PEP 1 time is enof unless you want to get lag when a banned player trys to log in…

-Doggie u get a reward for being the stupiest person of the month of moparisthebest,i dont think windows defender gonna know that that person is ip banned -.- u retard…

I hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Mod Adam, post:10, topic:117749”]He’s changing his port number… his ip should be something like XXXXXXXXXXX.net:port

In your IP Ban text file, only put this part in: XXXXXXXXXXX.net

Don’t put the port in.[/quote]

item.title: Omfg real hackers? mod on my server for solution!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

He’s changing his port number… his ip should be something like XXXXXXXXXXX.net:port

In your IP Ban text file, only put this part in: XXXXXXXXXXX.net

Don’t put the port in.

Read full topic
